messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] books on CD
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 1/18/04 2:19:43 PM, Mattamandab@aol.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 1/18/04 2:19:43 PM, Mattamandab@... writes:

<< Don't part with yours, they last a long time!!! >>

I have considered how much fun it will be for grandchildren if I have not
only CDs and tapes with readalongs but RECORDS!! I'll have a private historical
museum of children's stuff. <bwg>

Sandra

messages.subject: books on CD
messages.msgSnippet: Sandra, I love Scholastic books on tape!    We are getting quite a collection. My mother saved all of my books on tape from when I was a child and now my
messages.messageBody:
Sandra,

I love Scholastic books on tape! We are getting quite a collection.
My mother saved all of my books on tape from when I was a child and now my
children listen to my "superscope story teller presents..." tapes including 3
Billie Goats Gruff and Jack & the Beanstalk!
Don't part with yours, they last a long time!!!
Amanda


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
